channel.title: Three-month-old child fighting for life after forcing a baby wipe into his ass
channel.description:
Yes, don't be mistaken it's pretty much as horrible as it sounds. http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/scotland/glasgow_and_west/10285707.stm
A man who left a three-month-old child fighting for life after forcing a baby wipe into his bottom to prevent a dirty nappy has been admonished.
Usually when I hear cases of rape and stuff I can sort of see it from a pedophiles point of view, obviously finding young girls attractive. But this time I can't actually comprehend what the fuck this guy was thinking.

item.title: Three-month-old child fighting for life after forcing a baby wipe into his ass
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:5, topic:343446”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=439842.msg3232395#msg3232395 date=1276197667]
well it wasnt intentional was it?
[/quote]

Yes, he said he did it to keep the diaper clean, that he didn’t know it would harm the child. Seems like a lie to me though.[/quote]“When McArthur was questioned by police about the injuries they found him to be somewhat vague and evasive.”

Obviously there’s a lot more to it than we’re reading. He could have been working from home and the baby kept crapping, so he shoved it up there in a rage and then realised that he did something retarded so tried to remove it in haste: “The next day in a bid to remove the wipe using his fingers, McArthur caused significant internal injuries, including a perforated bowel.”

Read full topic

item.title: Three-month-old child fighting for life after forcing a baby wipe into his ass
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I don’t see how it couldn’t have been abuse. No one would possibly think that would be alright for a baby or anyone. This guy should have wipes shoved up his ass until he dies, that would be justice.

By the way, for my fellow Americans to avoid confusion:
Nappy == Diaper, I guess.
